meanings.definition: The act of arranging words or items in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent1: I alphabetizations my books to make them easier to find.
meanings.sent2: The librarian spent hours on alphabetizations of the library shelves.
meanings.sent3: The alphabetizations of the grocery list made shopping a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her alphabetizations of the names created a harmonious flow in the directory.
meanings.sent5: The alphabetizations of the files were so neat and tidy.

meanings.definition: The process of organizing information in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent1: The alphabetizations of the index helped locate the information quickly.
meanings.sent2: During the alphabetizations of the documents, some were misplaced.
meanings.sent3: His alphabetizations of the recipes made cooking more fun.
meanings.sent4: The alphabetizations of the names brought a sense of order to chaos.
meanings.sent5: The alphabetizations of the list made it easy to follow.
